# Flex



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Type  | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----- | ----------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how "justifyContent" aligns individual items along the main axis. Corresponds to the "alignContent" css property. | `any` | `"stretch"` |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                                                                              | `any` | `"stretch"` |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default "row" defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                                                                    | `any` | `"row"`     |
| `flow`           | `flow`            | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                                                                              | `any` | `"block"`   |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                                                                               | `any` | `"start"`   |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                                                                     | `any` | `"nowrap"`  |
